QuestData.Title: In the House of the Red Crane
QuestData.Description: "Broken are the bodies wherein hopeless hearts reside - the blight of despair strikes forth from inside."$B$BThis was the last piece of wisdom the Red Crane imparted to me, just hours before the Sha outbreak. It makes sense now...$B$B$p, when the Sha attacked, they broke forth from the temple's basement...$B$BAll of his teachings - the very Way of the Crane itself... it's all been preparation for facing the Sha of Despair.$B$BThe Red Crane has been expecting this conflict for centuries!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Haunting the basement of the Temple of the Red Crane.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter the basement of the Temple of the Red Crane and defeat the Sha of Despair.
QuestData.RewardText: You have vanquished the Sha of Despair. My order can handle the remaining cleanup from here.$B$BIt seems the time has finally come to face the consequences of Shaohao's actions.$B$BThis conflict has been a long time coming - the arrival of your people was merely a catalyst. Now, your help will be necessary if Pandaria is to survive.
